statements: UPDATE feedback_data SET overall_rating = 5, design_rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = 101;
UPDATE feedback_data SET feedback_text = 'Excellent service!', safety_rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 102;
UPDATE feedback_data SET overall_rating = 5, design_rating = 4, performance_rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 1001
UPDATE feedback_data SET safety_rating = 3, car_model = 'SUV', customer_name = 'John Smith' WHERE feedback_id = 1002
UPDATE car_feedback SET customer_name = 'John Doe', rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE car_features SET description = 'Advanced safety features' WHERE feature_id = 2;
UPDATE car_feedback SET rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Excellent service!' WHERE feedback_id = 101
UPDATE car_features SET description = 'This feature enhances the driving experience' WHERE feature_name = 'Automatic Parking Assist'
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = '701148b3-4f25-4fe7-8cb6-35f601819f4f';

UPDATE car_features SET description = 'New improved version available' WHERE car_model = 'SUV' AND feature_name = 'Safety Features';
UPDATE feedbacks SET rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = 123;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE feedbacks SET rating = 4, comments = 'Good service' WHERE feedback_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '123-456-7890', email = 'new@email.com' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service, highly recommended' WHERE feedback_id = 1234;
UPDATE CarModels SET year_model = 2022, manufacturer = 'Tesla' WHERE car_name = 'Model S';
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Excellent service, highly recommended.' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND car_model = 'SUV';
UPDATE CustomerRatings SET rating_value = 5, timestamp = '2022-03-15 09:30:00' WHERE feedback_id = 201 AND feature_id = 301;
